00029 #ifndef __Ray_H_
00030 #define __Ray_H_
00031 
00032 // Precompiler options
00033 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00034 
00035 #include "OgreVector3.h"
00036 #include "OgrePlaneBoundedVolume.h"
00037 
00038 namespace Ogre {
00039 
00041     class _OgreExport Ray
00042     {
00043     protected:
00044         Vector3 mOrigin;
00045         Vector3 mDirection;
00046     public:
00047         Ray():mOrigin(Vector3::ZERO), mDirection(Vector3::UNIT_Z) {}
00048         Ray(const Vector3& origin, const Vector3& direction)
00049             :mOrigin(origin), mDirection(direction) {}
00050 
00052         void setOrigin(const Vector3& origin) {mOrigin = origin;} 
00054         const Vector3& getOrigin(void) const {return mOrigin;} 
00055 
00057         void setDirection(const Vector3& dir) {mDirection = dir;} 
00059         const Vector3& getDirection(void) const {return mDirection;} 
00060 
00062         Vector3 getPoint(Real t) const { 
00063             return Vector3(mOrigin + (mDirection * t));
00064         }
00065         
00067         Vector3 operator*(Real t) const { 
00068             return getPoint(t);
00069         };
00070 
00077         std::pair<bool, Real> intersects(const Plane& p) const
00078         {
00079             return Math::intersects(*this, p);
00080         }
00087         std::pair<bool, Real> intersects(const PlaneBoundedVolume& p) const
00088         {
00089             return Math::intersects(*this, p.planes, p.outside == Plane::POSITIVE_SIDE);
00090         }
00097         std::pair<bool, Real> intersects(const Sphere& s) const
00098         {
00099             return Math::intersects(*this, s);
00100         }
00107         std::pair<bool, Real> intersects(const AxisAlignedBox& box) const
00108         {
00109             return Math::intersects(*this, box);
00110         }
00111 
00112     };
00113 
00114 }
00115 #endif
